10

Two dead, 19 hospitalized after concert in Mansfield

An Acton man, 19, and a N.Y. man, 27, died from drugs and alcohol in their system after a show at the Comcast Center in Mansfield Thursday, police said. (Boston Globe)
Olympics opening ceremony > NBC (taped)

Oh, to be in England: Ceremony scenes

The Olympic flame burned brightly on Friday during the Opening Ceremony for the 2012 Olympic Games at Olympic Stadium.
Seven young athletes carried the Olympic torch into the Olympic Stadium during the 2012 Olympic Games’ opening ceremony.
Fireworks exploded over London’s Olympic Stadium on Friday after the athletes from 205 countries finished marching into the stadium.
Paul McCartney performed “Hey Jude” on Friday during the Opening Ceremony of the 2012 Summer Olympics in London.
Members of the U.S. Olympic team marched into London's Olympic Stadium during the Opening Ceremony for the 2012 Olympic Games.
Members of Spain’s Olympic contingent showed off for the cameras Friday night as they marched into London's Olympic Stadium.
A parachutist landed outside London’s Olympic Stadium on Friday during the Opening Ceremony for the 2012 Olympic Games.
Olympic rings floated above artists performing during the Opening Ceremony of the 2012 Olympic Games on Friday in London.
Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, and Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge, attended the Opening Ceremony at the stadium.
The Royal Air Force Red Arrows flew over Olympic Stadium in London on Friday before the Opening Ceremony of the 2012 Olympic Games.
